entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Arm64: Use VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension APIs in libraries #84328
  • Property display name set via DisplayAttribute in validation messages are not used when app is native AOT published but are when trimmed #84324
  • CI System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests failure #84323
  • Support for adding default tags to specific meter and/or instruments #84321
    8.0.0
  • MSB3277 when using System.Reflection.Context in .NETStandard library consumed in .NETFramework #84320
  • JIT: loop inversion doing some questionable profile maintenance #84319
    8.0.0
  • Add pseudo-instruction to track GC state changes #84313
    Future
  • WASI app always tries to load icudt.dat from disk #84310
  • Consider adding BBJ_EHFAULTRET #84307
    8.0.0
  • MinimalApi: DateOnly json serialization #84305
  • .NET 8 Per-Preview Performance report on Mono AOT and Interpreter #84302
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 72 Regressions on 3/31/2023 11:04:55 PM #84309
  • Decompression Streams reading beyond compressed data. #84299
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_Path #84311
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting documentation for .NET 4.6 #84298
  • Runtime's illink runs don't catch certain set of warnings #84297
  • Can not access GlobalSystemMediaTransportControlsSessionManager in Windows 11 while running as service #84293
  • JIT: Inlining may produce incorrectly byref-typed SUB trees #84291
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Exceptions.Handling #84308
  • Allow cancellation of Process standard IO stream operations on Windows #84290
  • WebAssembly way to run either AOT or JIT at runtime #84288
  • AccessViolation when reading last byte from pointer to BitmapData #84287
    Future
  • find library=Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.arm64.dll [0]; #84286
  • Flow graph successors representation for BBJ_EHFINALLYRET #84278
    8.0.0

Closed

  • JIT should vectorize zeroing constant stackalloc-s #63500
    8.0.0
  • JIT poor codegen for calculating field offsets of structs #40021
    8.0.0
  • [mono] System.Drawing.Imaging.Tests.ImageAttributesTests.SetColorMatrix_InvalidFlags_ThrowsArgumentException fails #2337
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Common tests failed on Windows Mono due to COM wrappers #55655
    Future
  • System.Darwing.Common Icon tests failures on Mono on Windows. #47759
    Future
  • Short time format is missing space under en_US on Fedora 38+ #83571
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Drawing.Imaging.Tests.MetafileTests #34591
    Future
  • Unused generic type parameter should not cause loader failure #6924
    8.0.0
  • [LSRA] Add support for allocating consecutive registers #39457
    8.0.0
  • Merged test groups - check behavior when a test with incorrect settings is added to a merged directory #84182
  • Arm VectorTableLookup and VectorTableExtension - Part 2 #81599
    8.0.0
  • Make get_hostfxr_parameters.dotnet_root behave the same on linux and windows #83403
  • [libraries-jitstress-random] Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' #83963
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] Recognize when length is never negative for `Span<T>::.ctor(void*, int32)` #83248
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Initialize MsQuic only when HTTP3 will be used to send the request. #76445
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Investigate raising interpreter inlining threshold #77073
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext Name creates invalid AssemblyName when Source Assembly was loaded from byte Array #84295
  • trying to change Unix file access using Mono.Unix. Getting Unable to find an entry point named 'Mono_Posix_Syscall_stat' in DLL 'Mono.Unix #84166
  • Regression: ObjectDisposedException in overridden FileStream.Dispose(bool disposing) #82186
    8.0.0
  • Regression: Derived FileStream no longer calls Close in DisposeAsync #82176
    8.0.0
  • Improvement for library tests summary #84294
    Future
  • AssemblyLoadContext unloading fails when custom usercontrol instance is created in plugin #84292
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/Runtimelab_578/arr/arr.sh #84277
  • jitstress-random-libraries: Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #83333
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR JIT-generated code does not respect the Win x64 calling convention for the Memcpy/Memset helper calls #80140
    8.0.0
  • OperatingSystem.IsLinux() returns false when running as exe on WSL2 ubuntu #84283
  • Allow the timers created by TimeProvider to communicate if is resettable #83949
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Add check-service-labels.yml to unblock base branch PRs #84332
    area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Add check-service-labels.yml to unblock base branch PRs #84331
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reenable VectorLookup tests for mono. #84330
  • Move COM source generator APIs to System.Runtime.InteropServices.dll #84329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add HttpClient.Shared #84327
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use better trimming message in ValidationContext #84326
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Add TextWriter.FlushAsync(CancellationToken) #84325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #84322
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update branding to 7.0.6 #84316
    Servicing-approved
  • Update branding to 6.0.17 #84315
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Tar: Add missing TarFile.CreateFromDirectoryAsync roundtrip tests #84303
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Add back IComparable-based optimization to FrozenDictionary/Set #84301
    area-System.Collections
  • [browser] Blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Speed up named type lookups in managed type system #84285
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch CustomAttributeTypeNameParser to use common type name parser #84281
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2150844 #84276
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Remove unused native memcopy helpers. #84314
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Suppress linker warnings properly #84272
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Mark FirstCharInUInt32IsAscii with aggressiveinlining #84306
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • JIT: use synthesis to repair some reconstruction issues #84312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle some "field offset computation" patterns #81998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • ConvertIcuTimeFormatString: convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces too. #83589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fast-path in String.Trim #84300
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use similar types for self-referential generics instead of the exact canonical type #83995
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.17
  • Add error check for skipped tests in merged groups #84284
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Fix re-use val zero on GC tracking #84051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • don't load MsQuic unless needed by HttpClient #83494
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix parallel SuperPMI output handling #84219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][sgen] Remove old code associated with domain unload #84242
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix FrozenDictionary/Set handling of ValueTuple keys #84280
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix gtMarkAddrMode assert #84252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Library mode enhancements. #84165
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Mono] Support get_Count and get_AllBitsSet for mini JIT on Arm64 #84180
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Static cctor analysis for reflection #84089
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add issues.targets entry for known issue #84007 #84268
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Properly allocate shadow space for block op helpers on win-x64 #84124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix reflection invoke file format issue for generic methods #83438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introduce a diagnostic switch to turn off the use of file mapping in PE loader. #84151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix debugger stack unwind AV #84270
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement the ENDFINALLY opcode in the jiterpreter #84273
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Derived Interface support in ComInterfaceGenerator #84271
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [WIP] Avoid clearing uncommitted mark array #83623
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84189
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid scaning the used region if there are no free units #81525
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part2 (down-level support) #84235
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Correctly display the GCSettings specified in the runtimeconfig json via the GC Configuration API Call #84201
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Don't overwrite pinned assembly versions in servicing #84079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • [wasm] Simd refactoring #84170
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Retry after timeout on debugger tests on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Add a (disabled) prototype for a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Vector128 and Vector256 in interface cast #83000
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Implement the JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [wasm-mt] Allow JSImport promises to run on managed threadpool worker threads #83838
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Memory<byte> buffer field backing MemoryStream #84103
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.Dot as intrinsic for arm64. #84245
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enabled Sqrt and Abs intrinsics #84011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` compare #84249
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-codeflow
  • [test] Try to get more details from hanging build #84253
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
